name: 美琴
text:
……うん
でも、プロデューサー

name: 美琴
text:
もう優勝したみたいな雰囲気だけど
まだ、準決勝だから……って
trans:
You're making it seem like we've already won, even
though this was just the semifinals.

name: 美琴
text: これ、前にも言った気がするね
trans:
......
I feel like we've had this conversation before.

name: 美琴
text:
まだ、スタートラインに立って
片足をあげたくらい
trans:
I've only lifted up one foot off the starting line.
That's where we are now.

name: 美琴
trans: Now to get that foot back on the ground...

name: 美琴
text:
なるべく大きく、一歩
踏み出せたらいいな
trans:
I'd like to make that first step as big a leap as
I possibly can.
